info.title: Headless Delivery Commerce Cart API
info.description: Headless Delivery Commerce Cart API. A Java client JAR is available for use with the group ID 'com.liferay', artifact ID 'com.liferay.headless.commerce.delivery.cart.client', and version '4.0.50'.
